span.span: method that indicates whether the checked value passed the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定模型使您可以将相关联与你或对象。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 你可以通过子类化来创建自定义规则类并实现方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法返回要报告的检查的值是否有效对象。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅"数据验证"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示将标记为无效如果它包含非数字字符或外部下限和上限的输入的值的验证规则的实现。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果值是无效的属性和属性返回设置为相应的错误消息和`false`分别。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-csharp[BindValidation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/AgeRangeRule.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定模型使您可以将相关联与你或对象。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 你可以通过子类化来创建自定义规则类并实现方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法返回要报告的检查的值是否有效对象。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅"数据验证"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示将标记为无效如果它包含非数字字符或外部下限和上限的输入的值的验证规则的实现。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果值是无效的属性和属性返回设置为相应的错误消息和`false`分别。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-csharp[BindValidation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/AgeRangeRule.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定模型使您可以将相关联与你或对象。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 你可以通过子类化来创建自定义规则类并实现方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法返回要报告的检查的值是否有效对象。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅"数据验证"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示将标记为无效如果它包含非数字字符或外部下限和上限的输入的值的验证规则的实现。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果值是无效的属性和属性返回设置为相应的错误消息和`false`分别。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
